constantValues: Container for feedback and ratings for knowledge articles.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'Feedback' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
arguments.name: stateCode_display

constantValues: Shows whether the feedback is open, rejected or closed.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'Feedback' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
arguments.name: statusCode_display

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User and Team' adds the 'ownerId' attribute below to the 'Feedback' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user or team who owns the knowledge article views.
Type a title for the feedback.
Specifies how helpful the related record was.
Shows the rating scaled to a value between 0 and 1 based on minimum and maximum ratings.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'source_display' is added to the 'Feedback' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'source'
arguments.name: source_display

constantValues: Shows where the feedback was submitted from.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Feedback and KnowledgeArticle and Contact' adds the 'regardingObjectId' attribute below to the 'Feedback' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Shows the record that the feedback is associated with.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User' adds the 'createdBy' attribute below to the 'Feedback' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User' adds the 'createdOnBehalfBy' attribute below to the 'Feedback' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User' adds the 'modifiedBy' attribute below to the 'Feedback' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Shows who last updated the record.
Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User' adds the 'modifiedOnBehalfBy' attribute below to the 'Feedback' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who modified the record.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'BusinessUnit' adds the 'owningBusinessUnit' attribute below to the 'Feedback' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the business unit that owns the knowledge article views.
Unique identifier of the user who owns this feedback.
Unique identifier of the team that owns the feedback.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User' adds the 'closedBy' attribute below to the 'Feedback' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the record was closed. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.
Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.
Date and time that the record was migrated.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Currency' adds the 'transactionCurrencyId' attribute below to the 'Feedback' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.
Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Contact' adds the 'createdByContact' attribute below to the 'Feedback' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Shows the contact who created the record.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Contact' adds the 'createdOnBehalfByContact' attribute below to the 'Feedback' entity as a key
